tatami.core.agent.webServices

Interface WSAgentImplementationInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WSAgentImplementation

    public interface WSAgentImplementationInterface
    Implementing class provides the implementation for various operations necessary for accessing / registering web services.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String doAccess(java.lang.String uri, java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String message)
      Invokes a web service with a single, String, parameter, and a String return value.
      java.lang.String doSimpleAccess(java.lang.String uri, java.lang.String request)
      Invokes a web service using an HTTP connection (instead of using the WS plug-in).
      boolean registerService(AgentComponent agent, java.lang.String agentName, java.lang.String agentClass)
      Registers the agent as a web service.
      boolean unregisterWS(AgentComponent agent)
      Unregisters the web service corresponding to the agent.

    • Method Detail

      • registerService

        boolean registerService(AgentComponent agent,
                      java.lang.String agentName,
                      java.lang.String agentClass)
        Registers the agent as a web service.
        Parameters:
        agent - the Agent instance;
        agentName - the name of the agent;
        agentClass - the type of the agent (e.g. CLAIM agent class);
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful.

      • unregisterWS

        boolean unregisterWS(AgentComponent agent)
        Unregisters the web service corresponding to the agent.
        Parameters:
        agent - the Agent instance;
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful.

      • doAccess

        java.lang.String doAccess(java.lang.String uri,
                        java.lang.String serviceName,
                        java.lang.String message)
        Invokes a web service with a single, String, parameter, and a String return value. // FIXME: make it work for objects
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI of the service;
        serviceName - the name of the service at that URI;
        message - the parameter / message;
        Returns:
        the result of the invocation.

      • doSimpleAccess

        java.lang.String doSimpleAccess(java.lang.String uri,
                              java.lang.String request)
        Invokes a web service using an HTTP connection (instead of using the WS plug-in).
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to connect to;
        request - the request to send;
        Returns:
        the result of the invocation.
